title: UAE set to help fund OpenAI’s in-house chips
description:
OpenAI’s ambitious plans to develop its own semiconductor chips for powering advanced AI models could receive a boost from the United Arab Emirates (UAE), according to a report by the Financial Times. The report states that MGX — a state-backed group in Abu Dhabi — is in discussions to support OpenAI’s venture to build AI... Read more »

The post UAE set to help fund OpenAI’s in-house chips appeared first on AI News.
